Question.Subject: NZers: Have you decided who you're going to vote for?
Question.Content:
And has this changed from previous years?
I'm just curious. Bay of Plenty- Are you even old enough to vote? hahaha

Answers.Answer:
Maybe Labour. John Key is too busy looking after his rich mates, while the rest of us pay.
Yes, I have usually voted National. I do see myself as a conservative
